Package com.golden.gamedev.engine.jogl

Consists JOGL OpenGL Graphics API, do not use this package directly, use OpenGLGameLoader class instead.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JOGLFullScreenMode Graphics engine for OpenGL JOGL Full Screen Exclusive Environment (FSEM),
JOGL is available to download at https://jogl.dev.java.net/.
JOGLGraphics Fake Graphics2D for OpenGL JOGL.
JOGLRenderer Listen to JOGL events and init the JOGL renderer.
JOGLWindowedMode Graphics engine for OpenGL JOGL Windowed Environment,
JOGL is available to download at https://jogl.dev.java.net/.
Texture A texture to be bound within JOGL.
TextureLoader A utility class to load textures for JOGL.
 

Package com.golden.gamedev.engine.jogl Description

Consists JOGL OpenGL Graphics API, do not use this package directly, use OpenGLGameLoader class instead.

Package Specification

  • JOGL library (available at https://jogl.dev.java.net/) is required to run JOGL OpenGL Graphics API.
